mentionedBy.name: Squarespace
mentionedBy.notes: Offered complex design control with e-commerce functionality on higher tiers. Popular among designers and developers wanting creative freedom with custom checkout flows and content management.

mentionedBy.name: Squarespace
mentionedBy.notes: Most customizable website builder offering advanced customization, scalability, and strong CMS. Best suited for designers and developers with technical experience. Had learning curve requiring days to months to master.

mentionedBy.name: Squarespace
mentionedBy.notes: Most customizable website builder offering advanced customization, scalability, SEO tools, and strong CMS. Best overall alternative for users needing design control. Requires significant learning investment ranging from days to months depending on technical experience.

mentionedBy.name: Wix
mentionedBy.notes: Emerging professional website builder targeting designers and developers who wanted advanced design control and clean code output. Unlike Wix's beginner focus, Webflow catered to professionals needing sophisticated customization without coding.

mentionedBy.name: Wix
mentionedBy.notes: Professional-grade website builder for designers, developers, and agencies wanting advanced design control and clean code output. Offered over 2,000 templates with complete customization freedom. Superior SEO capabilities with custom meta tags and schema markup. Code export capability for easy migration. E-commerce Plus at $74/month.

mentionedBy.name: Wix
mentionedBy.notes: Leading professional website builder with growing popularity among businesses, agencies, and creators. Visual web design platform combining design flexibility, built-in CMS, and fast hosting in one package. Better than Wix for professional design needs, offering more control than traditional drag-and-drop builders. Superior for SEO and performance with clean code output and advanced optimization. Allows code export for easy migration unlike Wix's platform lock-in.
